responses: Hmph what do you want? Well make it quick...
My name is Tsundere~~chan. Please, stand aside and don't get in my way.
Its not like I wanted to speak with you anyway
Its privilege to speak to me, so its your loss
It's a privilege to even be able to talk to me! You should be honored!
Dummy, you are'nt making any sense
Fine be like that I dont want to undertsand you anyway
You are so dumb that whatever you said makes no sense
Don't misunderstand, it's not like I like you or anything...
Can you be ANY MORE CLUELESS?
I know right I have something called beauty, something that you don't have,
